3: They'd go so far... for you...?
Because you're wrong from the start, Camu! It's not only power that can protect yourself!
My reliable companions will be there for me as well!
But, I must admit, I was wrong too.
I am weak. Far weaker than you. And it's because of you that I can control Tenebrion and repel the viral corruption.
It's with your help that I managed to get this far.
...You finally understand that?
Yet one body can never have two consciousnesses within it.
I know, but neither of us has to disappear.
Because, you are me, and I am you. We're both Kamui.
And together, we are one.
...How long did it take you? You finally understood the crux of the problem...
Whatever...
You know your true weakness now.
And you have your trustworthy companions.
You have shown me very well that you have the mettle to fulfill your promise of protecting everything.
...I'll resign from this war.
They're back!
Did he succeed? Or fail?
Oh, Bianca, can you stop pointing that thing at my head? It's dangerous!
Looks like it's a success.
That's great!
Ah, Commandant's here as well!
I only managed to make contact with you with Commandant's guidance and Liv's assistance.
Well, I don't understand the details, but I'm still thankful all the same. It's thanks to you all that I've managed to return.
Let's leave the talk for later. We need to extract from here now.
If we stay for too long, we might give the Ascendants a chance.
N-no!
Calm down, what's happening Liv?
I just received an emergency message—
Babylonia... is under attack!
